DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate anorectal function hemicolectomy preserve Inferior Mesenteric Artery ( IMA ) . This study want demonstrate IMA preservation could improve patient 's quality life reduce incontinence and/or constipation rate .
DOC.brief_title: Improvement Anorectal Function While Preserving Inferior Mesenteric Artery Performing Left Hemicolectomy Diverticulosis
DOC.criteria: Age 18 80 year BMI < 35 Presence symptomatic diverticular disease ASA IIII age > 80 year BMI > 35 ASA IV Hinchey IIIIV Past perform procedure could modify nervous pattern ( i.e . colorectal surgery , leave nephrectomy , hysteroannessectomy )
